body.p:
Owensboro Febry 10th 63
Col Alf Allen
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir

Geo H Roberts of Hawesville signed a bond as the bail or surety of one D Grant -- At the time he executed the bond he was healthy drunk -- I have endeavored to find the Judgement on the Books of the Police Judge of Owensboro but have been unable to find it -- Roberts desires to be relieved of the payment of the fine -- The enclosed letter which Mr Sweeney wrote to Roberts will explain the case
